@media screen and (max-width: 480px), screen and (device-aspect-ratio: 40/71), screen and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5), screen and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio:.75) {

    .span_2_of_2, .span_1_of_2,
    .span_3_of_3, .span_2_of_3, .span_1_of_3,
    .span_4_of_4, .span_3_of_4, .span_2_of_4, .span_1_of_4,
    .span_5_of_5, .span_4_of_5, .span_3_of_5, .span_2_of_5, .span_1_of_5,
    .span_6_of_6, .span_5_of_6, .span_4_of_6, .span_3_of_6, .span_2_of_6, .span_1_of_6,
    .span_7_of_7, .span_6_of_7, .span_5_of_7, .span_4_of_7, .span_3_of_7, .span_2_of_7, .span_1_of_7,
    .span_8_of_8, .span_7_of_8, .span_6_of_8, .span_5_of_8, .span_4_of_8, .span_3_of_8, .span_2_of_8, .span_1_of_8,
    .span_9_of_9, .span_8_of_9, .span_7_of_9, .span_6_of_9, .span_5_of_9, .span_4_of_9, .span_3_of_9, .span_2_of_9, .span_1_of_9,
    .span_10_of_10, .span_9_of_10, .span_8_of_10, .span_7_of_10, .span_6_of_10, .span_5_of_10, .span_4_of_10, .span_3_of_10, .span_2_of_10, .span_1_of_10,
    .span_11_of_11, .span_10_of_11, .span_9_of_11, .span_8_of_11, .span_7_of_11, .span_6_of_11, .span_5_of_11, .span_4_of_11, .span_3_of_11, .span_2_of_11, .span_1_of_11,
    .span_12_of_12, .span_11_of_12, .span_10_of_12, .span_9_of_12, .span_8_of_12, .span_7_of_12, .span_6_of_12, .span_5_of_12, .span_4_of_12, .span_3_of_12, .span_2_of_12, .span_1_of_12  {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 460px) {

    .col {
        margin: 0 !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    #col_esq {
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    #col_dir {
        margin-top: 0 !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    .fb-like {
        margin-left: 15%;
    }

    .grid {
        padding: 0 5% 10px 5% !important;
        width: auto !important;
    }

    #header form {
        margin: 0;
        width: 70%;
    }

    #header form #s {
        background: url(../img/icon_search.png) no-repeat;
        background-color: #FAF8F6;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 4px 3px;
        float: right;
        padding: 5px 5px 5px 25px;
        width: 80% !important;
    }

    .hide_mobile {
        display: none !important;
    }

    #home {
        margin-top: 25px;
    }

    .pikachoose .jcarousel-container {
        overflow-y: hidden;
        overflow-x: scroll;
    }

    #logo {
        margin-top: 0;
    }

    .menu-link {
        display: block;
    }

    #menu-nav {
        padding: 5px 4%;
    }

    #sidebar_left {
        margin-bottom: 20px;
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    #tvufsc {
        height: 230px;
    }

    #twitter-follow-button {
        margin-right: 15%;
    }
    
    .news_link a {
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 5px;
    }
}


@media screen and (min-width: 460px) and (max-width: 720px) {
    .col {
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    #col_esq {
        width: 65% !important;
    }

    #col_dir {
        width: 32% !important;
    }

    .fb-like {
        margin-left: 5%;
    }


    .grid {
        padding: 0 5% 10px 5% !important;
        width: auto !important;
    }

    #header form {
        margin: 0;
        width: 70%;
    }

    #header form #s {
        background: url(../img/icon_search.png) no-repeat;
        background-color: #FAF8F6;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 4px 3px;
        float: right;
        padding: 5px 5px 5px 25px;
        width: 80%;
    }

    .hide_mobile {
        display: none !important;
    }

    .pikachoose .jcarousel-container {
        overflow-y: hidden;
        overflow-x: scroll;
    }

    #logo {
        margin-top: 0;
    }

    .menu-link {
        display: block;
    }

    #menu-nav {
        padding: 5px 4%;
    }

    #sidebar_left {
        margin-bottom: 20px;
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    #twitter-follow-button {
        margin-right: 5%;
    }
    
    #zikazeroimg {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: -1px;
    width: 25%;
    float:right;
    }

}



@media screen and (min-width: 720px) and (max-width: 960px) {
    .col {

        #zikazeroimg {

    }
}
